name: Crypto International
description: Crypto International is an ERC20-based token created by HR blockchain company COSMETA. As a global company, COSMETA is expanding its influence around the world, starting in the United States. COSMETA is a company that is working on a project that combines HR recruiting services and blockchain and was created to make the settlement of international students and all immigrants convenient. Continuing the project, it aims to provide convenience to all immigrants, including Koreans, from all over the world. Currently, COSMETA is forming partnerships with many global companies, and we are continuing to increase the number of partners.
